Description:
Detects an appx package deployment that was blocked by the local computer policy

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Deployment Of The AppX Package Was Blocked By The Policy
Query: sourcetype="windows-appxdeployment-server" (eventid="441" OR eventid="442" OR eventid="453" OR eventid="454")
